title: Russia's Energy Strength Becomes Its Greatest Vulnerability
description: Russia’s dependence on oil and gas revenues has long been one of the country’s greatest economic strengths. That same dependence is now becoming one of its most significant vulnerabilities. In November, Russia’s energy revenues fell sharply, underscoring how …
